text_logic_form: Find the length of the line segment $JK$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the line segment $JK$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line segment $LK$ is $4x$.
The length of the line segment $JK$ is $3x + 6$.
The length of the line segment $JL$ is $5x - 6$.
The length of the line segment $JK$ is equal to the length of the line segment $LK$.
The length of the line segment $LK$ is equal to the length of the line segment $JL$.
